entry.title: IBM AIX Questions
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. lsp works well only in current directory, if you specify another directory it doesn't work very well ...

entry.title: IBM AIX Tips
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

Display the total disk usage of the current directory.

du -lsm

Display the disk usage of sas data set files â€¦
entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

Display the total disk usage of the current directory.

du -lsm

Display the disk usage of sas data set files.

du -lsm *.sas7bdat

Calculate the md5sum of a file.

csum -h MD5 fileName
